name: slope (neoluigiyt)
description:
Install instructions
  1. -download the game.
  2. - put the file where you want.
  3. - extract the .rar file.
  4. - delete the .rar file.
  5. - go to . . . /windows/windows
  6. - open RTXSlope.exe and enjoy.

to run the game you need a Nvidia RTX or the game will lag if you don't have an Nvidia RTX but with a good graphic card the game can run correctly.
